casebody.data:
First Department,

February, 1981

(February 3, 1981) In the Matter of Bernard Adelstein, as Secretary-Treasurer of Private Sanitation Union Local 813 Affiliated with International Brotherhood of Teamsters, Respondent, v Thomas J. Manzo, Inc., Appellant.

Resettled order and judgment, Supreme Court, New York County, entered on October 11, 1979, unanimously affirmed. Petitioner-respondent shall recover of respondent-appellant $75 costs and disbursements of this appeal. No opinion. Concur — Murphy, P. J., Birns, Ross, Markewich and Lynch, JJ.
